page.title: 02INDUSTRY
page.content: There are two areas of industry in our block.One is along the Allander River in Milngavie .The other is in the old Bleachworks at Graigton, now used for small work places where once there was a large factory.In the Thermal Insulation Engineers there are 45 employed.The other two companies have 9 all to gether employed In Milngavie there are 9 or 10 factories employing more than 500 people.The largest number work in 2 factories, one making boxes for packaging and the other making flexible tubing.Allander travel who run a daily bus service to Inverness have their garage here.The most intersting of the other factories is the factory that makes suction lifting equipment.
